title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 901.12 - Change of operator
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 901.12 - Change of operator

State Regulations
(a) Any change
in the legal entity authorized to operate a life care community shall require
the prior approval of the Life Care Community Council. The applicant shall be
required to submit a certificate of authority application which shall be
subject to review and approval in the same manner as the original application, provided that continued public need for the community shall be
presumed. (b) The commissioner may
waive any part of the application which is not deemed relevant to the change in
ownership. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
901.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
